summary: This code instructs to extract data from the video API, send it to a specific URL, use the resulting cookie for downloading the video from another URL to avoid errors.

details.comment: This code instructs to extract data from the video API, send it to a specific URL, use the resulting cookie for downloading the video from another URL to avoid errors.
details.content:
the data is hide in the video data-api. unquote it and we will get the info. 
post data to https://v.anime1.me/api, then use responded cookie p,h with the original e(timestamp) for download.
download video from https://shiro.v.anime1.me/(or elsewhere) or somehow we will get it wrong.
